column4: Hey, I removed my graphics card, reconfigured (onboard graphics)  and restarted gdm. But now my screen does'nt look that great, and the refresh rate only goes up to 60? I think I ust have misconfigured it (I had to choose 'Generic Graphics Card') how can I work out what settings to use? e.g. what is y graphics card (chip) etc?
m key doesnt work properly, sorry
yeah, how can I find out?
